All seasons of the year are suitable places to visit, but autumn is not recommended beyond the end of October. It didn't rain when it came, but the weather was bad. It's very beautiful. If you have extra time or are willing to get up early, you can turn to the traditional Korean garden "Morningjing Arboretum". Especially after mid-November, there will be "Five-color Starlight Courtyard Exhibition" in the evening.

Catch up with a rainy day, misty rain, everything looks so beautiful. The art of design is very unique. The Photo Gallery near the front door is worth visiting. It's very small, but it can show the designer's mind. We had a meal in the Korean restaurant. To be honest, we paid attention to our behavior, but we could feel his disdain for Chinese people. I don't know why.

It seems like a really happy thing to take a walk in the arboretum. After parking your car, go into the arboretum and take a walk without knowing the time is passing. So, what if you walk with your ears listening to the sounds of nature rather than listening to songs in your ears, which is really the best choice.
this garden is very relaxing, seeing flowers and nice art form for trees and bonsai’s make my eyes really fascinated.

It is said that it is the best courtyard in Korea, with Chinese maps and about 3 hours of play time. The soup and rice dishes in the common dining hall are also well eaten. The greening management is very good. Korean people seem to like chrysanthemum very much, and the chrysanthemum is super large. They also see a lot in the airport. The layout is very careful. Each piece has different meanings. The construction meaning of each area is explained on the Chinese map. It's really good.

Chen Jing Arboretum had never heard of it before, but saw this place in the products of Nanyi Island's one-day tour. Imagine that there should be a lot of flowers and plants. I think I can go by. This scenic spot can be said to be a colored egg. The whole Arboretum is composed of several independent courtyards of different styles. The trees and flowers are carefully managed. The garden plays soothing music. It is an excellent place to relax both physically and mentally.

Here perennial flowers blossom, pine trees stand, while quietly enjoying the mountain forest bath, but also to enjoy narcissus, tulips, infinite flowers, chrysanthemums and other wild flowers. It's true here. I believe everyone here will be surprised.

Although the time is very tight, because we have to pinch the time of the circular bus, but we all feel that this trip is worth it. This place is like a Korean resort. We see many Koreans, but we don't see any Chinese except us. The scenery here, in a word, is beautiful.

Chenjing Horticultural Tree Garden is located on the Tree Garden Road above Kaping County, Gyeonggi Road. The background of Chenjing Gardening Tree Garden is Zhuling Mountain with beautiful natural landscape. Moreover, a garden expressing Korean sentiment is set up. Because there are green cypress, you can bathe in the forest. Twenty gardens each have their own themes. Gardens, lawns and walks are naturally linked. Sunken Garden is the representative garden of Morning Quiet Gardening Tree Garden.
